mapper.select: SELECT KD_CD kdCd, PRINCIPAL_COMP_CD prinipalCompCd, DRUG_NM_KOR drugNmKor, DRUG_MANUF drugManuf, HIRA_ATC_CD hiraAtcCd, HIRA_ATC_NM hiraAtcNm, STD_CD stdCd, DRUG_NM_ENG drugNmEng, SUBSTANCE_NM substanceNm, AMOUNT1 amount1, UNIT1 unit1, EFT_SUBST_NM eftSubstNm, AMOUNT2 amount2, UNIT2 unit2, AMOUNT3 amount3, UNIT3 unit3, MED_DOSE_FRM medDoseFrm, MED_DOSE_FRM2 medDoseFrm2, MED_DOSE_FRM3 medDoseFrm3, RT_OF_ADMIN rtOfAdmin, SUB_ALT_KEY subAltKey, SUBSTANCE_NM2 substanceNm2, EFT_SUBST_NM2 eftSubstNm2 from CM_MEDICINE where KD_CD not in (select distinct ORI_CD from MAP_KCD_SCT2 where ORI_TP_CD='MEDI') and JOB_CD='S';

SELECT KD_CD kdCd, PRINCIPAL_COMP_CD prinipalCompCd, DRUG_NM_KOR drugNmKor, DRUG_MANUF drugManuf, HIRA_ATC_CD hiraAtcCd, HIRA_ATC_NM hiraAtcNm, STD_CD stdCd, DRUG_NM_ENG drugNmEng, SUBSTANCE_NM substanceNm, AMOUNT1 amount1, UNIT1 unit1, EFT_SUBST_NM eftSubstNm, AMOUNT2 amount2, UNIT2 unit2, AMOUNT3 amount3, UNIT3 unit3, MED_DOSE_FRM medDoseFrm, MED_DOSE_FRM2 medDoseFrm2, MED_DOSE_FRM3 medDoseFrm3, RT_OF_ADMIN rtOfAdmin, SUB_ALT_KEY subAltKey
from CM_MEDICINE where KD_CD not in (select distinct ORI_CD from MAP_KCD_SCT2 where ORI_TP_CD='MEDI') and JOB_CD='O';

SELECT count(1) FROM CM_MEDICINE K WHERE KD_CD IN ( SELECT ORI_CD FROM MAP_KCD_SCT2 WHERE MAP_VER = 0
)

SELECT PRINCIPAL_COMP_CD prinipalCompCd, KD_CD kdCd, DRUG_NM_KOR drugNmKor, DRUG_MANUF drugManuf, HIRA_ATC_CD hiraAtcCd, HIRA_ATC_NM hiraAtcNm, STD_CD stdCd, DRUG_NM_ENG drugNmEng, SUBSTANCE_NM substanceNm, AMOUNT1 amount1, UNIT1 unit1, EFT_SUBST_NM eftSubstNm, AMOUNT2 amount2, UNIT2 unit2, AMOUNT3 amount3, UNIT3 unit3, MED_DOSE_FRM medDoseFrm, RT_OF_ADMIN rtOfAdmin FROM CM_MEDICINE WHERE KD_CD = #{kdCd} AND SUB_ALT_KEY = #{subAltKey};

SELECT PRINCIPAL_COMP_CD prinipalCompCd, KD_CD kdCd, DRUG_NM_KOR drugNmKor, DRUG_MANUF drugManuf, HIRA_ATC_CD hiraAtcCd, HIRA_ATC_NM hiraAtcNm, STD_CD stdCd, DRUG_NM_ENG drugNmEng, SUBSTANCE_NM substanceNm, AMOUNT1 amount1, UNIT1 unit1, EFT_SUBST_NM eftSubstNm, AMOUNT2 amount2, UNIT2 unit2, AMOUNT3 amount3, UNIT3 unit3, MED_DOSE_FRM medDoseFrm, RT_OF_ADMIN rtOfAdmin FROM CM_MEDICINE WHERE KD_CD = #{value};

SELECT M.ORI_CD oriCd, M.SCT_ID sctId, M.MAP_VER mapVer, M.MAP_STAT_CD mapStatCd, M.RV_STAT_CD rvStatCd, M.DISP_ODR dispOdr, M.UDT_DT udtDt, S.SCT_TERM sctTerm, CD.CD_DSCRT mapStatNm FROM MAP_KCD_SCT2 M LEFT OUTER JOIN CM_SNOMEDCT S ON M.SCT_ID = S.SCT_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN MCODE CD ON LEFT(M.MAP_STAT_CD, 1) = CD.CD_ID AND CD.CD_GRP = 'MAP_STAT_CD' AND CD.CD_STAT_CD = '0' WHERE M.ORI_CD = #{value}
